summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MOZTEC Batch 2 features. Backend APIs performing excellently with 96.2% success rate (25/26 tests passed). All new Batch 2 features implemented correctly: multi-currency transactions, company profile settings, and branch balance management. Frontend integration working very well with multi-currency form toggle, add/remove currency items, and company settings form all functional.

minor_issues.issue: Single transaction creation returns 200 instead of 201

ui_bugs.issue: Wallet icons for branch balance management not visible in branches table
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot access branch balance dialog from UI, but API works

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/transactions/multi - multi-currency transaction creation
Backend: GET /api/settings/company - company settings retrieval
Backend: PUT /api/settings/company - company settings update
Backend: GET /api/branches/{id}/balances - branch balance retrieval
Backend: PUT /api/branches/{id}/balances - branch balance update
Backend: Multi-currency transaction batch voucher generation
Backend: Multi-currency transaction count verification (2 transactions created)
Backend: Company settings update verification
Backend: Branch balance update verification
Backend: All existing endpoints (branches, currencies, customers, transactions, dashboard, users)
Frontend: Multi-currency transaction checkbox toggle working
Frontend: Add currency item button functional
Frontend: Remove currency item button functional
Frontend: Multi-currency form showing proper currency items (#1, #2)
Frontend: Multi-currency total calculation display (Rp 0)
Frontend: Company profile form visible and populated
Frontend: Company name field working with test data
Frontend: Company settings save button present
Frontend: Transaction dialog opening and closing
Frontend: Navigation between pages working
Frontend: Admin authentication and dashboard access
Frontend: Settings page navigation and tabs
Frontend: Transaction creation dialog functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Add visible wallet icons in the branches table for accessing branch balance management dialog. The API endpoints work perfectly, but the UI access point (wallet icon) is not visible to users.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (All major features working, minor UI access issue)
